name: RequestreportbyStatus
description: Retrieves Subscriptions' reports, filtering by status. The report will be sent by email, to the address inserted in the API's path.

requesterEmail.description: Email that the report will be sent to

status.description: Binary OR of the following status: 1 - ACTIVE; 2 - PAUSED; 4 - CANCELED; 8 - EXPIRED

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.
